heading: 1.1 paper
text: methods: different text mining approaches spotlight different historical trends/fluctuations/moments environmental-labor history last 150 years?compare (1) methods (2) time-period intervalsat progressively granular time periods (maybe: 25yr–>15yr–>5yr?), analyze text mining metrics together (re)tell “history” environmentfocus (1) enviro (2) enviro-labor speeches
